summary:
‚ô•Ô∏è I choose to believe that love is still stronger than hate, hope is still stronger than fear, and truth is still stronger than lies. 

America (as a whole) has made *some choices* but we (as individuals) still get to choose what we do now.  

People around you are going to need your help, love, and support in the time ahead...
